metrics.multiple_testing_warning: Only one parameter set was tested (N=3). If you test multiple parameter sets or universes, correct for multiple testing (e.g., White Reality Check or SPA).

explanation: Monthly-ranked long-short strategy by 24-month rolling beta vs CPI MoM. Signals computed using information up to month t and executed next month (one-bar delay). Transaction costs (commission+slippage) and per-asset caps applied. Bootstrapped Sharpe CI computed with 2000 resamples.
